title: gofmt doesn't line up "=" in const declaration
body:
by **snilsson@nada.kth.se**: 
// gofmt doesn't line up "=" in const declaration
package main

const (
	umax uint                  = ^uint(0) // maximum value for a uint
	bpu  = 1 << (5 + umax>>63)            // bits per uint
)

func main() {}
